>
[Perfect Readiness](/Feats.aspx?ID=3212) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 119 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

You prepare to fire with an instinctive speed and muscle memory that go beyond your conscious thoughts. You're permanently [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32). You can use your extra action only to Step or Interact to reload.
